name: Mario In Mushroom Rix Land 2: Gimmicky Island
summary: The sequel to the first Mario In Mushroom Rix Land game. The story follows after the first Mushroom Rix Land game, Bowser has just escaped with his Clown Cart from Rix Land. He took all resources, from his Rix Land castle. And took them to make his very own island called Gimmicky! And build all the death traps, spikes and more! Mario must stop him! Before the Gimmicky island gets more bigger and bigger and destroy the world!!
